avdta.network.node

Class IPTBR

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.node.IntersectionControl
      • avdta.network.node.TBR
        • avdta.network.node.IPTBR

  • public class IPTBR
extends TBR
    This class solves the conflict region integer program by calling CPLEX. This will find an optimal solution to the integer program, but may result in high computation times when used for networks with multiple intersections.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class avdta.network.node.TBR
